pkgmetadata.longdescription: Automatic Phylogenetic Tree Generator // Generates phylogenetic trees and distance matrices ('brranching', https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=brranching) from a list of species name or from a taxon down to whatever lower taxon ('taxize', https://github.com/ropensci/taxize). It can do so based on two reference super trees: mammals (Bininda-Emonds et al., 2007; doi:10.1038/nature05634) and angiosperms (Zanne et al., 2014; doi:10.1038/nature12872).
